channel.title: Privacy on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: ZJUKLAB at SemEval-2025 Task 4: Unlearning via Model Merging
item.description: Model Merging: An unlearning system, which combines specialized models, achieves top results in SemEval-2025 Task 4 by selectively erasing sensitive knowledge.

item.title: Trusted Machine Learning Models Unlock Private Inference for Problems Currently Infeasible with Cryptography
item.description: Machine learning models can enable secure computations previously impossible with cryptography, achieving privacy and efficiency in Trusted Capable Model Environments (TCMEs).
